
--- Part 1 ---

```{r eval = FALSE}
check_n <- function(n, v){
  sums <- combn(input,n,sum)
  product <- combn(input,n,prod)
  return(product[sums == v])
}

x <- purrr::map(1:8, check_n, v= sum(input)/3)
min(unlist(x))
```
